website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy, rechargeable unit is effective in combating most types of house fires. We recommend checking the pins upon arrival, though.
pros: Versatile for extinguishing fires from dry combustibles, flammable liquid, and live electrical articles
cons: Some customers reported the plastic mechanism that holds the pull pin is temperamental
Wall-mounting bracket could be more secure

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT include a wall mounting bracket!
customer_reviews.text: The product description claims "Includes Wall Bracket". This is VERY misleading! What they're referring to amounts to a "hole" in the product (see photo) designed to ATTACH to a wall-mounted bracket, but the necessary wall mounting hardware is NOT included in the package! I had to separately buy an after-market wall-mountable hook in order to mount this on the wall, and it's not as secure or quick-release as a mounting bracket designed for extinguishers should be.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Sent me and empty extinguisher!
customer_reviews.text: Hate to even give 1 Star!! Extinguisher arrived covered in dust, pin pulled, and emptied!!! I paid $50 for this???!? This is a dirty paper weight! It won’t stop any fire! Update: They sent me a fully charged and operational charge extinguisher to replace the defective unit. I’ll up the rating to two stars because of that, but nothing higher because their quality control should never have let the bad unit ship in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product with subpar details
customer_reviews.text: Well-built unit, fully charged. Two problems which prevent a five-star rating: As with other reviewers, the tamper-proof plastic seal was broken (and in bottom of the box, in my case.) And the plastic strip which prevents loss of the safety pin is so stiff that it actually pulls the pin out of place; I will be cutting it off and replacing it with string. I have emailed the seller to ask if the problems will be remedied in the future, and I'll report back if I get a substantive reply.
customer_reviews.author: contranym

customer_reviews.title: You need these through you house...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome fire extinguishers. I've used one recently on a car electrical fire and the fire was done and put out within a matter of seconds. I bought 4 of these this time as they need to be centrally located on each floor of my house, as well as in the garage. I need to order a couple more for my vehicles. It's always better to have more fire extinguisher agent left over than not enough. You get ~18-21 seconds of fire suppression. which as a volunteer firefighter, is great for fires that are quickly discovered.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: just what i expected
customer_reviews.text: it's a decent sized fire extinguisher, that isn't made of plastic pieces like the others. just what i needed for the kitchen, hopefully i never have to use it. it came in the original fire extinguisher box, with the "full" gauge exposed through the box. the "wall bracket" is a little misleading, as it's just a hole in the handle for hanging - there's nothing to attach it to the wall. that doesn't bother me, as i just put it under the sink in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: b²

customer_reviews.title: Must have for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: They never seem to mention needing a fire extinguisher when you're out on your own, but one day I realized I didn't even know where the one in my rental was. I ended up buying this one and while the price tag was a bit staggering, I feel this one is more able to deal with a fire than the smaller, cheaper ones. It also arrived with the tamper seal intact and charged. I just hope I never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Acire

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, safely, and secured properly
customer_reviews.text: I got what I ordered. A charged extinguisher that had tamper proof seals and it came with a hook mount. I read on the other reviews of the mount not being included so I ordered a fork mount separately but ended up not needing it. After several reviews of types of extinguishers this was the best option for my apartment and I'm glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rodney A. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Great manufacturer, good value and is 2nd one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great manufacturer, good value and is 2nd one of this type that I've purchased. Just remember to turn upside once a year an thump sides with someone "non-puncturing" to keep chemical loose inside if not used.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus

customer_reviews.title: Feel much better having it
customer_reviews.text: I know you can’t really “review” something like this but, I feel so much better having it. Went through fire extinguishing training at work recently and had the local fire chief doing the training. He gave a very detailed and extensive explanation on why you should have a good brand name extinguisher in you home and NOT a Walmart Kidde. Hopefully I never have to use it but like I said I feel much better having it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny84

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, hope I don't need to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something a little bigger than standard HD size, remember even at 5# you only get 10 or so seconds of discharge time. Brand has been around for a long time so trust it will be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Noxious Fumes Emanating from its Shipment Box.
customer_reviews.text: When the extinguisher arrived, I started coughing on this foreign material/dust. Get it open and ... looks like it exploded mid travel. As this is a third party, I have to first ask them for a refund. They were unresponsive to my replies and had to twist arms to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: C. Punk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality metal head extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Hard to really know if it is good till you need it! Having said that, It has a metal head and came fully charged. Has an easy to use bracket if you need to retrieve it in a hurry. Kind of just a hook. Also, remember to put on the included zip tie thingy to hold pin in place until needed. I didn't on last one and pin fell off and it was bumped into... mess.
customer_reviews.author: Tophat101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fire Extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: We already had a fire extinguisher in the kitchen but now that my husband's on O2 we felt we needed more and bought 2. They come with a nice mount for attaching to a wall. The extinguishers are exactly as described and were shipped in appropriate packaging. Good buy, too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baron

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve ever had a fire in the house with one of the small fire extinguishers, you’ll realize in a minute how important it is to have a large enough extinguisher. These are so good I now have them all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully i have not had to use this yet. ...
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully i have not had to use this yet. I am giving it 5 stars because i know many large institutions (hospitals) that use this product. Amarex seems to be a very trusted name. A while ago i purchased a Kiddie ABC fire extinguisher and it lost pressure at some point. Luckily i noticed it before i needed it and ordered a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: L C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: As expected. But I suggest that a fire extinguisher should have the safety pin wire tied in place during shipment. It came with the safety seal broken and the safety pin hanging from the handle. If you've ever had a fire extinguisher accidentally discharge in a moving vehicle, you'll never forget it. It causes total panic. I would hate to see a shipping company have a terrible accident. SECURE THE PIN!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just make sure the tamper device is intact
customer_reviews.text: The extinguisher arrived and looks to be in good shape. The problem is the tamper evident device. Unfortunately, the plastic was broken and at the bottom of the box when it arrived. Otherwise a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Burr

customer_reviews.title: A non-review review
customer_reviews.text: You really can't write an actual review until you use the item. And I honestly hope I'll never have to use it. But based on feedback from the professional firefighting community, you can't go wrong with an Amerex branded extinguisher. I appreciate the all metal construction and the hose discharge will make it easier for the wife to use, if it comes to be. My general rule of thumb is to not rely on a single source, which might fail to work. Two co-located extinguishers, a couple of those spray can type dowsers (only for smoldering electrical devices) the requisite baking soda and fire blanket. And a smoke detector in every room.
customer_reviews.author: UnregisteredTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wall bracing with no screws or instructions
customer_reviews.text: Wall mount bracing is a joke, no screws or instructions other than that if you find it for better price with no wall bracing go for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tardis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Shipped a used, defective fire extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: See the photo. The fire extinguisher I received was 1) Not properly charged. See the pressure gauge in the photo. It is in the red zone of the dial 2) Broken. You can see in the photo that the upper part of the handle is no longer anchored to the unit 3) Covered in white dust I suspect someone thought that they could ship me an old, used unit as a new one
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So so product
customer_reviews.text: Pin already pulled on arrival. Poor excuse for a wall bracket. Disappointed but it is functional
customer_reviews.author: faires no heart

customer_reviews.title: Useless with the handle sheared off
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with handle sheared off and may be unsafe or useless now. I'll have to pay to have it serviced if I want to know since it can't be returned
customer_reviews.author: j.a.c

customer_reviews.title: All aluminum heads instead of plastic like the competitors you find at the Orange or Blue ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the cadillacs of extinguishers. All aluminum heads instead of plastic like the competitors you find at the Orange or Blue stores. Well worth the investment to have fire fighting equipment in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Collector

customer_reviews.title: Received Item, No Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: I received the product but it didn't come with a wall mount like promised. I've contacted the seller. Edit: I got a small wall mount in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Came covered in extinguisher powder without the safety pin
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because of all the good reviews but was disappointed to receive a fire extinguisher with a broken seal that sprinkled powder all over my living room when I opened the package
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best brands of extinguishers in the world.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best brands of extinguishers in the world. I spent 30 years in the business selling and servicing fire extinguishers in New York City.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Polichak

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it’s a fire extinguisher.
customer_reviews.text: It came unexpired and fully charged. Nice solid fire extinguisher. Haven’t used it (thankfully). Came with a mounting bracket which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: AnCC

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a fire, so I won't actually know if this product functions as described until I do. It came packaged nicely and in-tact. Comes with a wall mount. Looks good, makes me feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Cox

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: It's strikingly well made, and very clearly marked. I hope to never use it in a big fire, but I know I'll be able to count on it.
customer_reviews.author: nibbles

customer_reviews.title: Arrived discharged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived discharged with the pin already pulled and powder all over. Shoddy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Great price. Didn’t have to hassle with the crowds at the box store.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: High quality 5 lb fire extinguisher - ABC
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, no experience using it yet. However, units arrived promptly and came with mounting bracket as indicated. This is known to be a good brand, but should be checked annually and recharged every 5-6 yrs or immediately after using it
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know if they work luckily! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for two and comes with hangers as well. Passed the home fire inspection and that was the main goal! Hopefully I will never need to test them
customer_reviews.author: Master_Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a fire extinguisher, If I ever need it I will at that time rate it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Tapie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.  Just what i ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Just like it states. Fast shipper as well.
customer_reviews.author: wendy Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Luckily, I haven't had to use it, but it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Veitauto

customer_reviews.title: Fire extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: The fire extinguisher was as the ad stated. It also came with brackets to put on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Titus

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fire extinguisher. Hope I never have to use it.!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and ease of use at a reasonabl cost
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with quality and ability of extinguisher to manage a fire
customer_reviews.author: Dean Driver

customer_reviews.title: Used fire extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Saftey was pulled and fire extinguisher had been discharged already. No mounting bracket as in add. Amazon doesn't care. Go to store better deal and better chance of not getting used fire extinguisher
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Received as ordered. New stock. Bracket included and instruction sheet included also. Quality item for money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: So happy I ordered and received another one!
customer_reviews.text: The extinguisher was delivered earlier than expected, packaged perfectly and exactly as promised. I was so happy I ordered - and already received - a second one!
customer_reviews.author: philipzelinger

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I was expediting this fire extinguisher on Thursday but it came today, 2 days early. Great service. The fire extinguisher appears to be well made, no plastic parts, a good solid product. Hope I never need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: James A Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: it is what is expected
customer_reviews.text: liked the hanging bracket much easier to remove than the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of high quality - all metal. Hope we never have to use it but if we do we are hopeful it will work as well as the reviews state.
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as promised
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the need to use the product, but it is available for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Adao Roberto da Silva

customer_reviews.title: High quality extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal construction, can be refilled, company easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Always be prepared
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fire extinguisher to be handy in case of a fire near my wood stove. It's very easy to use and a comfortable size for us ladies. I feel confident and safe that I can take care of any emergency.
customer_reviews.author: shirley castle

customer_reviews.title: A must to have in your home
customer_reviews.text: We feel safer now with the Americans fire extinguisher in the home. You never know when you made it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. Package came without the bracket. Contacted seller and had bracket within few days . Thanks so much for the fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ready to go, and now its under the kitchen sink if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tialian

customer_reviews.title: Quality extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, good seller. Great fire extinguisher, came fully charged. Fire Marshal Bill would be proud.
customer_reviews.author: error1oading

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: The seal came broken and the fire extinguishers body and handle are scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Amerex makes the best
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it but I've heard Amerex is the best so I had to buy one. Maybe someday in the future this will save a life.
customer_reviews.author: ButturedToast

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery of the extinguisher and the item is date stamped with same year for inspections.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and price! Quick delivery and great follow up.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and price! Quick delivery and great follow up.
customer_reviews.author: N.Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $50
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box. Fire extinguisher was set off. White powder in the box pin was out zip was broken. Don't trust the fire extinguisher in an emergency. $50 out the door
customer_reviews.author: drew spencer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Its a Fire Extinguisher. Looks good. Hope I never have to use it. What more can you say?
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: so happy.
customer_reviews.text: got the CO from the inspector with this item...so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It looks good,
customer_reviews.text: Seems to look good. I can't really try it without a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Inside Edge Dental

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent...even if you never use it!
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need to change my review....peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Fullerton CA

customer_reviews.title: Mounting "Bracket" (Hook Only) Useless On Drywall
customer_reviews.text: Mounting Bracket is just a hook, and can only be used if you have a stud near where you need to affix it, or if you like DIY carpenter projects. So I have to buy a real wall-mounting bracket in addition. No easy to find information as to which Amerex bracket is appropriate - I finally found it in a product catalog of accessories downloaded from their web site! I will order an 818 bracket, it seems the most economical. Why not include that information where you expect it - with the product description under "Accessories".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fire extinguisher in one of my apartments and this product was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: The handle on one of the two extinguishers delivered was broken
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: fire extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: wanted to have one in the home for emergency purpose. I haven't used it yet and hope not to, but when I do, It will comforting to know I have it
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: SIM Supply Inc - exc. place to purchase this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from SIM Supply Inc. When it arrived I was worried that the needle in the pressure gauge was right at the edge of green and even went into the red at one point but came back again. I contacted the seller, and they quickly sent out a replacement. I was very impressed by their customer service. The extinguisher itself looks robust but I haven't had to use it so can't exactly rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lillith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs to have a mount that wraps around the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: The brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use this yet, thank God, but I have high expectations for it. When I went to buy an extinguisher I talked to my brother, who was a fireman. He suggested this brand as the one to buy. Unfortunately, he died a week after it arrived and I was never able to let him know how I felt about his suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: s b r

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: My family has lot of arson investigators and fire chiefs in it. We're big on fire safety in my family, is what I'm saying. Metal pieces on a fire extinguisher are important; plastic is prone to melting and breaking. I haven't used this one yet. I emailed the local FD to ask if they offered inspections for home fire extinguishers. He said that if I thought something looked off or if I just wasn't sure to bring it in. Your local FD probably would do the same. But mine is fully charged and the handle and connections seem in order. PS: Ask your homeowners insurance people if they offer discounts for fire extinguishers in the house. Some do!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Well-made fire extinguisher is solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made fire extinguisher is solidly built. Came with the mounting hardware and instructions for mounting and for usage. Amerex is very well-known in the industry and they make good, reliable products - hopefully, I'll never have to see this in action!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Steve L.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: After reading multiple reviews, I decided on this brand as it was rated the highest and the handles are not made of plastic. I am very happy that I took the time to do that........Very good purchase! Great quality....will be able to sleep tonite.
customer_reviews.author: Goodwitch777

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a fire extinguisher I trust
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a cheesy consumer grade fire extinguisher. I've known two people that have had those cheapy, but name brand, extinguishers not work even though the indicator said they were fully charged. This thing is all metal and basically built to put out fires instead of just giving you the impression it might.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a different seller for this product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived needing to be recharged. Now we have to find a professional to recharge the "new" fire extinguisher before having had to use it once. I would recommend a different seller for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking we needed these for a long time. Sure enough, a couple weeks later we got a knock on the door...someone's car was on fire. We got it out before the fire department arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Fire extinguisher company in my town wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Fire extinguisher company in my town wanted twice ad much for the same size & I didn't have to leave the house! Arrived almost a week earlier than I anticipated, which is always a plus! I hope I never have opportunity to use it. ..... but I am prepared if so.
customer_reviews.author: MRush

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a wall unit we had to use for a fireplace fire
customer_reviews.text: This unit fit into the same bracket as our previous unit of about the same size. It is a large unit and covers the ABC type of fires which fits well into what we might need.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy duty. I like that this brand doesn't have a plastic handle also -- as plastic is not recommended by most firefighters. We haven't needed to use it yet (thankfully) but we're pleased with it so far and the peace of mind it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Kalex

customer_reviews.title: I find the fire extinguishers to be well made with a good price to value ratio
customer_reviews.text: 12/09/17 - The two fire extinguishers were received on a timely basis and were accurately described in the product description that the time of order. I find the fire extinguishers to be well made with a good price to value ratio. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better having it around
customer_reviews.text: This thing is professional grade! I feel so much better having it around. Luckily I have not had to use it yet. It's built really well with quality metal materials. It comes with a small piece that allows you to mount/hang it on a wall. You will need to buy screws but the directions tell you what you need.
customer_reviews.author: bwheels02

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, haven't actually used this on a fire
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for foster care certification. I haven't used it but the included hanger was solid and easy to install. No issues with the product and delivered item was exactly what I expected. Would buy again. Probably will once this one expires.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Must have to any home, great price and well worth the security for your family.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for our kitchen and laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our kitchen and laundry room. Easy to use and we will have more peace of mind, especially since we just had a fire in the laundry room that could have been devastating if I had not been right there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I feel much safer with this high quality product! Very well built! I was in a fire last year and my cheap store bought extinguishers did not work.. Now i buy only the best! Hope i never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me by a NYFD employee who told me ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid metal handle and trigger. This was recommended to me by a NYFD employee who told me to be wary of extinguishers with plastic handles and triggers as they can break when you need it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Metal parts, great extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have not had to use this yet, but I am glad to have it on hand in case I do. It has metal parts instead of plastic which was a must for me. I plan on buying more for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Good to have around, just in case.
customer_reviews.text: I hope they work when and if I ever need them. They look like quality units and have seen them around town in various businesses. I have never needed them but want them just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Potshot

customer_reviews.title: Seems good quality and based on previous reviews went with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems good quality and based on previous reviews went with this one. Others out there had parts that were plastic. Plastic and a fire don't mix (in my opinion). Thankfully I have not had to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: ... fire but from everything I've read these are the best to own
customer_reviews.text: We have not had a fire but from everything I've read these are the best to own, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I hope I never have to use it and will therefore never know if its good or not
customer_reviews.text: It came in a reasonable amount of time (4 days - external seller) and is what I expected. I hope I never have to use it and will therefore never know if its good or not. But it looks the part and passed a recent fire department inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Johari West

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use it yet but it's good to know we have a fresh fire extinguisher since ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but it's good to know we have a fresh fire extinguisher since we live where the "big one" (earthquake) is due any minute. It was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, go ahead.  Do it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised and was delivered in a very timely fashion. I can't tell you how it performed and I hope that I never find out.

customer_reviews.title: Hope i never use it but it hangs at the ready in my shop.
customer_reviews.text: My shop needed one if these for years. Hope I never have to use it. Its hard to render a review when you have never used the product.

customer_reviews.text: Really solid! No cheesy plastic parts. But, like others have said, the pin isn't secured during shipping. I was lucky, and mine arrived safely.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size for my house in case of fire until I can call for help

customer_reviews.title: Well Built.
customer_reviews.text: All metal handle/trigger which looks a lot sturdier than the plastic.

customer_reviews.title: but I am very pleased with the quality of workmanship compared to other extinguishers ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it, but I am very pleased with the quality of workmanship compared to other extinguishers I own.
customer_reviews.author: cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Great boat unit
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for a boat. Much better to deal with a fire than the small units that the CG requires
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The safety ring was already broken. The mountain hitch is too simple. Did not use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian

customer_reviews.title: Beefy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet but it feels very solid and metal. A big upgrade from what I had. It came with a wall bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Caton

product_meta.title: Amerex B402, 5lb ABC Dry Chemical Class A B C Fire Extinguisher, with Wall Bracket
product_meta.description: Amerex ABC Extinguishers effectively fight Class A, B, and C fires and are a popular choice for offices, warehouses, homes, and more. Steel cylinders and all-metal valves make these rugged, dependable extinguishers. They are easy to maintain and service, making them an economical choice too.
